v3
verse.lines: Thou, O Christ, art all I want; more than all in Thee I find; raise the fallen, cheer the faint, heal the sick, and lead the blind. Just and holy is Thy Name, I am all unrighteousness! Vile and full of sin I am, Thou art full of truth and grace.

verse.name: v4
